## Public Member Functions

### ComplexPatternFuncMutatesDAG() {#af431345c30396b855525264428b10e2a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::HexagonDAGToDAGISel::ComplexPatternFuncMutatesDAG () const"
